headline: UDR Announces Updates to Board of Directors
summary: DENVER, March 27, 2025--UDR, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, today announced that James "Jim" D. Klingbeil has decided not to seek re-election to the Company’s Board of Directors (the "Board") at the Company’s upcoming Annual Shareholder Meeting. Mr. Klingbeil will continue to serve as a member of the Board until his elected term ends at the Annual Shareholder Meeting and will relinquish his role as Lead Independent Director at that time. Acc
